newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Siddons to buy distribution business.
newsitem.headline: Siddons to buy distribution business.

text.p: Siddons Ramset Ltd said on Friday it has agreed to buy the business of F.H. Prager, a leading wholesale distributor of hardware and hand tools for an undisclosed sum.

Siddons managing director Roger Flynn said in a statement Prager had a product range of several thousand items, marketing its own brands and holding distribution rights for a number of international brands.
It was complementary to Siddons' existing Proline hardware supply business and operating cost savings were expected, he said. -- Sydney Newsroom 61-2 9373-1800
